templates.name: Welcome Note
templates.description: A welcome message template for new users
templates.title: Welcome to Notes App!
templates.content:
Welcome to your new notes application!

This app helps you:
• Create and organize notes
• Record voice memos
• Categorize your thoughts
• Export and share content

Get started by creating your first note!

templates.name: Meeting Notes
templates.description: Template for taking meeting notes with agenda and action items
templates.title: Meeting Notes - [Meeting Name]
templates.content:
📅 Date: [Date]
👥 Attendees: [List attendees]

📋 Agenda:
1. [Agenda item 1]
2. [Agenda item 2]
3. [Agenda item 3]

📝 Key Discussion Points:
• [Point 1]
• [Point 2]
• [Point 3]

🎯 Decisions Made:
• [Decision 1]
• [Decision 2]

📋 Action Items:
• [Name]: [Task] (Due: [Date])
• [Name]: [Task] (Due: [Date])

📞 Next Meeting: [Date and Time]

templates.name: Weekly Meal Plan
templates.description: Template for planning weekly meals and shopping lists

templates.name: Study Session
templates.description: Template for organized study notes and learning sessions
templates.title: Study Notes - [Subject/Topic]
templates.content:
📚 Study Session: [Topic]
📅 Date: [Date]
⏱️ Duration: [Time spent]

🎯 Learning Objectives:
• [Objective 1]
• [Objective 2]
• [Objective 3]

📝 Key Concepts:

1️⃣ **[Concept 1]**
• [Details]
• [Examples]
• [Applications]

2️⃣ **[Concept 2]**
• [Details]
• [Examples]
• [Applications]

3️⃣ **[Concept 3]**
• [Details]
• [Examples]
• [Applications]

🔗 Related Topics:
• [Topic 1]
• [Topic 2]

📖 Resources Used:
• [Book/Article 1]
• [Video/Course 2]
• [Website 3]

❓ Questions for Review:
• [Question 1]
• [Question 2]

📋 Next Study Session:
• [Topics to cover]
• [Resources to use]

templates.name: Workout Plan
templates.description: Template for workout routines and fitness tracking
templates.title: Workout Plan - [Workout Name]
templates.content:
💪 Workout: [Workout Name]
📅 Date: [Date]
⏱️ Duration: [Time]
🎯 Focus: [Muscle groups/Goals]

🔥 Warm-up (10 minutes):
• [Exercise 1]: [Duration]
• [Exercise 2]: [Duration]
• [Exercise 3]: [Duration]

💪 Main Workout:

🏋️ **[Exercise Category 1]:**
• [Exercise]: [Sets] x [Reps] @ [Weight]
• [Exercise]: [Sets] x [Reps] @ [Weight]
• [Exercise]: [Sets] x [Reps] @ [Weight]

🦵 **[Exercise Category 2]:**
• [Exercise]: [Sets] x [Reps] @ [Weight]
• [Exercise]: [Sets] x [Reps] @ [Weight]
• [Exercise]: [Sets] x [Reps] @ [Weight]

🧘 Cool Down (10 minutes):
• [Stretch 1]: [Duration]
• [Stretch 2]: [Duration]
• [Deep breathing]: [Duration]

📊 Progress Notes:
• Energy Level: [1-10]
• Difficulty: [1-10]
• Notes: [Any observations]

📋 Next Workout:
• Focus: [Next focus area]
• Adjustments: [Changes to make]

templates.name: Reading List
templates.description: Template for tracking reading goals and book reviews
templates.title: Reading List - [Year/Period]
templates.content:
📚 Reading Challenge: [Year]
🎯 Goal: [Number] books
📊 Progress: [Current]/[Goal] books

✅ **Books Completed:**

📖 **[Genre 1]:**
• "[Book Title]" by [Author] - ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
  📝 Notes: [Brief review or key takeaways]

• "[Book Title]" by [Author] - ⭐⭐⭐⭐
  📝 Notes: [Brief review or key takeaways]

📖 **[Genre 2]:**
• "[Book Title]" by [Author] - ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
  📝 Notes: [Brief review or key takeaways]

📚 **Currently Reading:**
• "[Book Title]" by [Author]
  📖 Progress: [Page/Percentage]
  📝 Thoughts so far: [Initial impressions]

📋 **Want to Read:**
• "[Book Title]" by [Author] - [Reason for interest]
• "[Book Title]" by [Author] - [Reason for interest]
• "[Book Title]" by [Author] - [Reason for interest]

🏆 **Favorites This Year:**
• Best Fiction: [Book Title]
• Best Non-Fiction: [Book Title]
• Biggest Surprise: [Book Title]

💭 **Reading Goals:**
• [Goal 1 - e.g., Read more sci-fi]
• [Goal 2 - e.g., Include more diverse authors]
• [Goal 3 - e.g., Read classics I've missed]

templates.name: Travel Itinerary
templates.description: Template for planning trips and travel itineraries
templates.title: Trip to [Destination]
templates.content:
✈️ Trip to [Destination]
📅 Dates: [Start Date] - [End Date]
👥 Travelers: [Names]

🛫 **Travel Details:**
• Departure: [Date, Time, Flight]
• Arrival: [Date, Time, Flight]
• Return: [Date, Time, Flight]

🏨 **Accommodation:**
• Hotel: [Name and Address]
• Check-in: [Date and Time]
• Check-out: [Date and Time]
• Confirmation: [Number]

📋 **Daily Itinerary:**

📅 **Day 1 - [Date]:**
• Morning: [Activity]
• Afternoon: [Activity]
• Evening: [Activity]
• Meals: [Restaurant/Plans]

📅 **Day 2 - [Date]:**
• Morning: [Activity]
• Afternoon: [Activity]
• Evening: [Activity]
• Meals: [Restaurant/Plans]

🎯 **Must-See Attractions:**
• [Attraction 1] - [Notes]
• [Attraction 2] - [Notes]
• [Attraction 3] - [Notes]

🍽️ **Restaurants to Try:**
• [Restaurant 1] - [Cuisine type]
• [Restaurant 2] - [Cuisine type]
• [Restaurant 3] - [Cuisine type]

💰 **Budget:**
• Flights: $[Amount]
• Hotel: $[Amount]
• Food: $[Amount]
• Activities: $[Amount]
• Shopping: $[Amount]
• Total: $[Total]

📱 **Important Info:**
• Emergency Contact: [Number]
• Hotel Phone: [Number]
• Local Transportation: [Details]
• Weather: [Expected conditions]

🎒 **Packing List:**
• Documents: [Passport, tickets, etc.]
• Clothing: [Based on weather]
• Electronics: [Camera, chargers, etc.]
• Medications: [As needed]
• Other: [Specific items for activities]

templates.name: Project Planning
templates.description: Template for project planning and management
templates.title: Project: [Project Name]
templates.content:
📊 Project: [Project Name]
📅 Start Date: [Date]
🎯 Deadline: [Date]
👥 Team: [Team members]
📋 Status: [Planning/In Progress/Review/Complete]

🎯 **Project Overview:**
• Objective: [Main goal]
• Scope: [What's included]
• Success Criteria: [How success is measured]

📋 **Key Deliverables:**
• [Deliverable 1] - Due: [Date]
• [Deliverable 2] - Due: [Date]
• [Deliverable 3] - Due: [Date]

⏱️ **Timeline:**

🗓️ **Phase 1: [Phase Name]** ([Start] - [End])
• [Task 1] - Assigned to: [Name]
• [Task 2] - Assigned to: [Name]
• [Milestone]: [Description]

🗓️ **Phase 2: [Phase Name]** ([Start] - [End])
• [Task 1] - Assigned to: [Name]
• [Task 2] - Assigned to: [Name]
• [Milestone]: [Description]

👥 **Team Roles:**
• [Name]: [Role and responsibilities]
• [Name]: [Role and responsibilities]

🔄 **Resources Needed:**
• Budget: $[Amount]
• Tools/Software: [List]
• External vendors: [If any]

⚠️ **Risks & Mitigation:**
• Risk 1: [Description] → Mitigation: [Plan]
• Risk 2: [Description] → Mitigation: [Plan]

📊 **Progress Tracking:**
• Overall Progress: [%]
• Current Phase: [Name]
• Blockers: [Any issues]
• Next Steps: [Immediate actions]

📝 **Meeting Notes:**
• [Date]: [Key decisions and updates]
• [Date]: [Key decisions and updates]

🎉 **Project Completion:**
• Final deliverable submitted: [Date]
• Stakeholder approval: [Date]
• Lessons learned: [Key takeaways]

templates.name: Daily Journal
templates.description: Template for daily reflection and journaling
templates.title: Daily Journal - [Date]
templates.content:
📔 Daily Journal Entry
📅 Date: [Date]
🌤️ Weather: [Weather]
😊 Mood: [Mood rating 1-10]

🌅 **Morning Thoughts:**
• How I'm feeling: [Emotions/energy level]
• Today's priorities: [Top 3 things]
• Intention for the day: [Focus/mindset]

📝 **Today's Highlights:**
• Best moment: [What made you smile]
• Achievement: [Something you're proud of]
• Challenge faced: [Difficult situation]
• How I handled it: [Your response]

🧠 **Reflections:**
• What went well: [Positive experiences]
• What could improve: [Areas for growth]
• Lesson learned: [Insight gained]
• Grateful for: [3 things you're thankful for]

👥 **People & Connections:**
• Meaningful conversation with: [Person]
• How I helped someone: [Act of kindness]
• Support I received: [Help from others]

🎯 **Goals & Progress:**
• Progress on current goal: [Update]
• Habit I practiced: [Positive behavior]
• Something new I tried: [Experience]

🌙 **Evening Wind-down:**
• Energy level now: [1-10]
• Tomorrow's focus: [Key priority]
• Affirmation: [Positive statement about yourself]

templates.name: Blank Note
templates.description: A completely blank template for free-form notes
templates.title: New Note
